content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 4, Málaga 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 4, Málaga 1.
Offside, Barcelona. Pedro tries a through ball, but Cesc Fàbregas is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Jesús Gámez.
Attempt saved. Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Thiago Alcántara.
Attempt saved. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez.
Foul by Martín Montoya (Barcelona).
Sebastián Fernández (Málaga) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Weligton.
Attempt missed. Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Pedro.
Attempt missed. Ignacio Camacho (Málaga) header from the right side of the six yard box is just a bit too high following a corner.
Attempt saved. Julio Baptista (Málaga) right footed shot from very close range is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Weligton.
Substitution, Málaga. Javier Saviola replaces Isco.
Corner,  Málaga. Conceded by Pinto.
Attempt saved. Julio Baptista (Málaga) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Sebastián Fernández.
Substitution, Barcelona. Alexis Sánchez replaces David Villa.
Offside, Barcelona. Javier Mascherano tries a through ball, but David Villa is caught offside.
David Villa (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ignacio Camacho (Málaga).
Substitution, Barcelona. Eric Abidal replaces Gerard Piqué.
Attempt missed. Ignacio Camacho (Málaga) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Jesús Gámez with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Málaga. Conceded by David Villa.
Substitution, Málaga. Sebastián Fernández replaces Joaquín.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Gerard Piqué.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Diego Lugano.
David Villa (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro Morales (Málaga).
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Joaquín (Málaga) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Málaga. Eliseu tries a through ball, but Julio Baptista is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Málaga) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Joaquín.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona).
Eliseu (Málaga) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Corner,  Málaga. Conceded by Javier Mascherano.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Málaga 1. Pedro Morales (Málaga) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Jesús Gámez with a cross.
Substitution, Barcelona. Thiago Alcántara replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Isco (Málaga) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Joaquín.
Attempt saved. Pedro Morales (Málaga) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jérémy Toulalan with a headed pass.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Málaga 0. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Xavi.
Attempt saved. Julio Baptista (Málaga) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Isco with a through ball.
Offside, Barcelona. Andrés Iniesta tries a through ball, but Jordi Alba is caught offside.
Hand ball by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Offside, Barcelona. Andrés Iniesta tries a through ball, but Pedro is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Weligton.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Julio Baptista (Málaga) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Second Half begins Barcelona 3, Málaga 0.
Substitution, Málaga. Pedro Morales replaces Roque Santa Cruz.
First Half ends, Barcelona 3, Málaga 0.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Eliseu.
Corner,  Málaga. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.
Attempt missed. Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Xavi with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Diego Lugano.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Weligton.
Corner,  Málaga. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.
Attempt blocked. Julio Baptista (Málaga) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Roque Santa Cruz.
Offside, Barcelona. Xavi tries a through ball, but David Villa is caught offside.
David Villa (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Ignacio Camacho (Málaga).
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Willy Caballero.
Attempt missed. Roque Santa Cruz (Málaga) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Joaquín with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Málaga. Conceded by Jordi Alba.
Foul by Jesús Gámez (Málaga).
David Villa (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Málaga 0. Martín Montoya (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Weligton.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Málaga 0. Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Foul by Roque Santa Cruz (Málaga).
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Málaga 0. David Villa (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Pedro.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
